name: Sites Cell
description: This element represents a cell container contained in a page row.

elements.helpText: This element controls the number of grid columns to span
elements.label: Span

elements.helpText: This element controls the number of grid columns to span
elements.label: Grid size

elements.helpText: This element controls the padding values for this cell
elements.label: Padding

elements.helpText: This element controls the margin values for this cell
elements.label: Margin

elements.helpText: This element controls the list of block content to be rendered in this cell
elements.label: Content

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
